name: comment.vim
summary: Comment-Uncomment Single/Multiple Files -added Tex file format
description:
Global Plugin to comment and un-comment different
source files in both normal and visual <Shift-V> mode

Refer to Jasmeet Singh Anand&#039s Original \"comment.vim\"
Entire script is copied and I, Keyur Joshi have just added support for two more file formats \".tex\" and \".bib\"
install_details:
For VIM 6 -
               Stick this file in your ~/.vim/plugin directory or
               in some other &#039plugin&#039 directory that is in your runtime path
               For VIM 5 -
               Stick this file somewhere and &#039source <path>/comments.vim&#039 it from
              your ~/.vimrc file
